content.en: Autonomous vehicle algorithms: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can improve various aspects of vehicle dynamics and control. They are investigating the use of adaptive neural networks, sliding mode control, fuzzy logic, and other algorithms to enhance path tracking, stability, and performance of autonomous and intelligent vehicles. These algorithms are being applied to systems such as steering, suspension, braking, and tire control to optimize their operation and response in different driving conditions.
content.da: Autonome køretøjsalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af køretøjets dynamik og kontrol. De undersøger brugen af adaptive neurale netværk, sliding mode control, fuzzy logic, og andre algoritmer for at forbedre banefølgen, stabiliteten og ydeevnen af autonome og intelligente køretøjer. Disse algoritmer anvendes på systemer som styring, affjedring, bremsning og dækstyring for at optimere deres funktion og respons under forskellige kørselsforhold.
